output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, specifically mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 - PSD)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement targeting 100,001-500,000 people in Bihor
4. Electoral objective: Yes, explicitly calls for votes using "votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official campaign message with CMF number
The post contains direct electoral propaganda for both the presidential election (Marcel Ciolacu) and parliamentary election (Gabriel Ghilea). While the parliamentary campaign is still allowed, the presidential campaign propaganda is prohibited after the end of the campaign period.
The message explicitly asks people to vote for Marcel Ciolacu as president ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte"), which constitutes clear electoral propaganda for the presidential election.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly asks for votes for a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Has clear electoral objective - Contains explicit call to action for voting
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, prin postarea cu ID 579459671127548 pe Facebook. Postarea, difuzata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, contine un indemn explicit de vot pentru candidatul Marcel Ciolacu la functia de presedinte ("votați Marcel Ciolacu președinte"), constituind propaganda electorala conform art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, fiind o comunicare cu caracter electoral, adresata unui public larg prin intermediul unei reclame platite pe Facebook, care depaseste limitele activitatii jurnalistice si care face referire directa la un candidat la alegerile prezidentiale.
